author: slava77
body:
- update matrix map for reco comparisons script:
    - add a new short matrix workflow 29034.0 and a few related variants for the Phase-2 D41 detector setup. This should resolve the issue triggering the warning "comparisons for the following workflows were not done due to missing matrix map" in the recent 10_6_X tests.
    - add EGamma2018D 136.886 map
- new plot for muMatches_.nDigisInRange
title: update in reco comparisons
